identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Redefine Miro as a Creative Powerhouse for the next generation.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk aesthetics with Swiss Grid precision.
Emotion First: The site must feel like a 'flow state'â€”intense focus, then release.
Content is King: Every interaction tells the story of 'Chaos to Clarity'.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make the neon content pop.

layout_strategies.grid_system: Use 'Bento Grid' (Mode A) for features. Asymmetry is mandatory.

Hero.interaction: Scroll-triggered animation. Initial state: 'Chaos' elements (papers, messy notes) scattered randomly. Scroll progress 0-30%: Elements fly into a neat grid, changing color from gray/yellow to Mint/Violet.
Hero.visuals: Split screen effect not by line, but by state. Use a 'slider' handle that the user can drag to reveal clarity.

ZenModeToggle.description: A pill-shaped floating toggle. When 'On', the entire page background dims, sidebars fade out, and only the active content remains bright.
ZenModeToggle.animation: Animate presence and opacity. Use Framer Motion layoutId for smooth transitions.

VisualMagnet.interaction: A scattered pile of 'cards'. As the user scrolls or hovers, they physically snap to a grid with a magnetic spring physics effect.

AISight.interaction: A search bar. When typed in, it doesn't just list results; it 'illuminates' related nodes in a graph visualization background.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge sonner
SETUP: Add the font imports to index.css immediately.
ACTION: Create a 'components/landing' directory for all landing page specific sections.
CRITICAL: Do not use the default 'slate' colors from Shadcn. Override them in tailwind.config.js with the palette provided.
VISUALS: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' heavily. The interface should feel like it's floating on glass.
ANIMATION: Use 'AnimatePresence' for the Zen Mode toggle. It's not just a CSS class change; elements must physically exit the DOM.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure the Violet (#7C3AED) has sufficient contrast on Black. If not, lighten it to #8B5CF6 for text.
TESTING: Add data-testid to the Zen Toggle ('zen-mode-trigger'), Search Bar ('ai-sight-input'), and Magnet Cards ('magnet-card').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' aesthetics: No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Dark Mode Only: This is a dark-themed brand. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
Motion is Meaning: Animations must explain the feature (e.g., Chaos -> Clarity), not just look cool.
Never use 'transparent' backgrounds for dropdowns/modals; use semi-transparent black with blur.
